output_data.clarification_question: Please specify the total time spent face-to-face and/or on documentation related to this established patient visit. Accurate time documentation (start and end time) is required for assignment of timed CPT codes (9083x/99xxx).
output_data.suggested_answer: 50 minutes (to align with the standard 90836 combined E/M and therapy service duration)?

primary_code.description: Psychotherapy, 45-52 minutes, with evaluation and management service
primary_code.rationale: The session involves complex clinical decision-making (titration of *Sertraline* due to lack of efficacy and concerning symptoms) combined with substantive psychotherapy (addressing feelings of being a failure and passive *death ideation*). Assuming standard time documentation (38-52 minutes) for a typical follow-up, 90836 is the most appropriate code for a prescribing provider delivering combined services.

output_data.medical_necessity: Recurrent Major Depressive Disorder, Moderate Severity (F33.1) requiring medication management titration and acute therapeutic intervention for passive suicidal ideation and vegetative symptoms.
